componentDescription: Enables users to select a country from a dropdown list with various styling options.

id.description: Optional ID for the CountryPicker input

error.description: Optional error flag to indicate validation state

name.description: Optional name attribute for the CountryPicker input

label.description: Optional label text for the CountryPicker input

helperText.description: Optional helper text for guiding the user

placeholder.description: Optional placeholder text for the CountryPicker input

shape.description: Optional shape of the CountryPicker for visual styles

isAutoFocus.description: Flag to auto-focus the CountryPicker on render

isReadOnly.description: Flag to mark the CountryPicker as read-only

isDisabled.description: Flag to disable the CountryPicker input

styles.description: Optional styles object specific to CountryPicker

size.description: Optional size of the CountryPicker for visual styles

value.description: Value to be used as the current selection

variant.description: Variant for different visual types of CountryPicker

shadow.description: Shadow or Elevation styles for visual depth and perspective

newOptions.description: Array of new options for dropdown list

options.description: Options array to populate the dropdown

option.description: The option value for the dropdown item
